description: Evaluate asynchronous tasks with configurable concurrency.
name: d3-queue

scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3-queue-bower && git pull && cp -v ../d3-queue/README.md ../d3-queue/LICENSE ../d3-queue/build/d3-queue.js . && git add README.md LICENSE d3-queue.js && git commit -m ${npm_package_version} && git tag -am ${npm_package_version} v${npm_package_version} && git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-queue/build/d3-queue.js d3-queue.v3.js && cp ../d3-queue/build/d3-queue.min.js d3-queue.v3.min.js && git add d3-queue.v3.js d3-queue.v3.min.js && git commit -m "d3-queue ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd ../d3-queue && zip -j build/d3-queue.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-queue.js build/d3-queue.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-queue.js -c -m -o build/d3-queue.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-queue.js -- index.js
